titles.title: Representation for Farmers Act

To amend the Environmental Research, Development, and Demonstration Authorization Act of 1978 to require the appointment of a member of the Science Advisory Board based on the recommendation of the Secretary of Agriculture.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Environment.

committee.name: House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology

bill.summary: 3/15/2011--Introduced. Representation for Farmers Act - Amends the Environmental Research, Development, and Demonstration Authorization Act of 1978 to modify the provision governing the composition of the membership of the Science Advisory Board to provide for the appointment of up to three Board members based on a recommendation of the Secretary of Agriculture (USDA).
